title: Got permanently suspended for being toxic.... nt rly
body:
well... i was playing and i got rekt in mid cos something is wrong with my pc... everytime i press b, k, l, c, and idk.. i get alt tabs
then my teammates start trashtalking me, they said they're going to report me cos i int and i was just saying things to protect myself
then after that game.. i got banned T^T
can i pls get unbanned... spent so much in this game and i love league..... 
help pls...

replies.body: ocean player : report report report report report report ,  all day all game ,

Can you even write in English, that was cancer for my eyes

But like SEKAI said, support ticket is the way to go

> [{quoted}](name=SharkyFizzy03,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ivLlVyXL,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-08-03T04:30:45.085+0000)
>
> It's called shortcuts

Shortcuts are lame, and make you sound intellectually challenged

Got a problem about everything mate?

Ur cancer lol ðŸ˜‚
top left corner > explore league > support > submit a ticket

> [{quoted}](name=SecondAirbane,realm=NA,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ivLlVyXL,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-02T23:32:12.810+0000)
>
> top left corner > explore league > support > submit a ticket


How do I do that??
Send a support ticket. They will discuss with you why you're banned. If falsely attributed, you can dispute it.
